source_reference.text: Video: 'The Priority of Culture In Relationships Part 2 | Dr. Myles Munroe' by Dr. Myles Munroe on Munroe Global (Jul 24, 2019)

content_summary: The Priority of Culture In Relationships Part 2 | Dr. Myles Munroe
content_detailed:
You can purchase the complete album via the link below. Available on CD, DVD, MP3 & MP4
http://bit.ly/KCIoRVol2

Kingdom Culture Influence Of Relationships Volume 2 Titles:
Disc 1 – The Priority Of Culture In Relationships Part 1
Disc 2 – The Priority Of Culture In Relationships Part 2
Disc 3 – The Priority Of Culture In Relationships Part 3

Dr. Myles Munroe speaks on how The Kingdom of God and its government should positively affect those that come in contact with it. What is the Kingdom of God? Where is it located? How will we know that it is here? The answer is, The Kingdom does not come through observation but through relationships.

#drmylesmunroe #mylesmunroe
